title: Why t.arange(0,3) create an int type Tensor?
body_html:
🐛 Bug

Code example

x=torch.autograd.Variable(t.arange(0,3),requires_grad=True)

RuntimeError: Only Tensors of floating point dtype can require gradients

The default type is floatTensor, how this bug happens?
